title: Chicken Scarpariello
ingredients: ['500g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons butter', '2 tablespoons shallots, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '250ml water', '125ml white wine', '1 chicken stock cube', '1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper']
